projects.title: Stock AI
projects.description: Developed a finance bot as a freelancing project to assist in predicting stock prices using historical data from the past 10 years, providing data-driven insights.
points: Integrated data analysis techniques, interactive chatbot functionality and graphical visualization of stock trends by Chart.js.
Enabled dynamic stock price predictions, ensuring seamless interaction and usability.
Added notification functionality using the Toastify library.

projects.title: NewsApp
projects.description: A fully functional News website that provides current news and articles to users.
points: Integrated News API: Dynamically retrieved news data and articles using a News API.
Added search functionality to retrieve data based on user input.
Implemented sign-in and sign-up for 200+ users using Firebase Authentication.

projects.title: Text Analyzer
projects.description: Text manipulation tool with multiple transformation features.
points: Developed 5+ text transformation functions including converting text to uppercase/lowercase.
Added 3+ customizable theme options, including dark/light mode.
Implemented character-wise and word-wise text counting for detailed analysis.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: A responsive Netflix clone with dynamic content loading.
points: Developed a responsive UI with 2 language options.
Integrated TDMB API for dynamic movie data retrieval.
Implemented continuous updates through API refreshes.
